biotools.summary: A novel likelihood-based method for genetic association with NGS data from external control groups. The tool substitutes genotype calls by their expected values given observed sequence data and implements a robust variance estimate for the score statistic.

bioschemas.name: RVS
bioschemas.summary: A novel likelihood-based method for genetic association with NGS data from external control groups. The tool substitutes genotype calls by their expected values given observed sequence data and implements a robust variance estimate for the score statistic.
